name: Miscellaneous charges
text:
§414D-18  Miscellaneous charges.  The department director shall charge and collect:
     (1)  For furnishing a certified copy of any document, instrument, or paper relating to a corporation, $10; and
     (2)  At the time of any service of process on the department director as agent for service of process of a corporation, $10, which amount may be recovered as taxable costs by the party to the action causing the service to be made if that party prevails in the action. [L 2002, c 130, §4; am L 2004, c 116, §5]
